tool.name: qiime2 feature-table subsample

param.name: table
param.label: table: FeatureTable[Frequency]
param.help: [required] The feature table to be sampled.

param.name: subsampling_depth
param.label: subsampling_depth: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [required] The total number of samples or features to be randomly sampled. Samples or features that are reduced to a zero sum will not be included in the resulting table.

param.name: axis
param.label: axis: Str % Choices('sample', 'feature')
param.help: [required] The axis to sample over. If "sample" then samples will be randomly selected to be retained. If "feature" then a random set of features will be selected to be retained.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: feature-table subsample ================================ Subsample table
Outputs: -------- :sampled_table.qza: The resulting subsampled feature table.
|
Description: ------------ Randomly pick samples or features, without replacement, from the table.
|
